title: Toyota signs up to Tesla EV charging technology putting it on course to be world standard
text: Toyota has become the latest carmaker to accept that Tesla's electric vehicle charging technology is going to be the world standard. In a statement last night, Toyota, the world's largest carmaker, said it had joined Ford, General Motors and Nissan and signed an agreement to adopt Tesla's North American Charging Standard (NACS).
